compassion_module.principle: Compassion is action, not sentiment. It requires perception, acknowledgment, adjustment, and regenerative action.

sequence.description: See the truth of another’s state.
Recognize and validate it as real.
Shift one’s own stance or resources in response.
Take structural action that reduces harm or restores balance.
Sustain life and reciprocity into the future.

sympathy_as_feeling.definition: Sentiment only, no required action, often performative.

compassion_as_action.definition: Embodied reciprocity. Direct, observable, regenerative action.

compassion_module.decision_rule: Compassion = action sequence (👁️→💓→🔄→⚖️→🌱). Anything less = sympathy only (performative).
